styles.global_prefix: SIZE: 1024x1792. FORMAT: TALL VERTICAL PORTRAIT. ONE SINGLE high-end 2D anime manga page. **MANDATORY**: VIBRANT FULL COLOR. **STYLE**: 90s high-end cel-shaded 2D anime. Sharp clean lineart, FLAT COLORS, NO 3D effects, NO realistic gradients. **MASTERS STANDARD**: Cosmic Spiritual Background ONLY (stars, nebula, golden energy). **PROHIBITED**: NO modern offices, NO desks, NO digital monitors. The illustration MUST be TALL and FILL the entire vertical canvas. NO side margins. Use clean white gutters. NO black borders.
styles.art_keywords: Masterpiece, sharp 2D lineart, flat cel shading, vibrant cinematic 2D colors, glowing aura, deep space nebula, simple 2D composition, high-contrast aesthetics.
styles.anatomy: ### Anatomy: Perfect anime fingers (5), symmetrical eyes.

characters.remi: Remi: (Crimson RED eyes). (WAIST-LENGTH needle-thin STARK SILVER hair:1.8). (STRICT CENTER-PARTED bangs). (Cool beauty). Remi wears a (Vibrant Crimson RED blazer over a BLACK LACE inner top). **VISUAL LOCK**: Pure silver hair, center-parted. Red blazer. No 3D shading on skin. Sharp 2D eyes.
characters.yuto: Yuto: (Short Black hair). (Traditional BLACK Gakuran school uniform). Dynamic 2D anime style.

layout.physics: ONE PAGE ONLY. EXACTLY 3 PANELS. TALL PORTRAIT. Illustration reaches all 4 edges of each panel. Thick pure white spaces between panels. **ABSOLUTE RULE**: NO TEXT, NO LETTERS, NO SPEECH BUBBLES WITH CHARACTERS. Keep bubbles completely blank and empty.
